content: "Stan" is a song by the American rapper Eminem, released in 2000 as a single from his third studio album, "The Marshall Mathers LP". The song tells the story of a fan named Stan who becomes increasingly obsessed with Eminem and eventually takes his own life along with his pregnant girlfriend after not receiving a response to his letters. The song is known for its dark subject matter and has been praised for its storytelling and Eminem's powerful delivery.
